") 00452 00453 # Start the OMICRON process in a new thread to avoid blocking the GUI 00454 omicron_thread = threading.Thread(target=self.start_omicron_process, daemon=True) 00455 omicron_thread.start() 00456 00457 def start_omicron_process(self): 00458 """Run the OMICRON command dynamically in WSL.""" 00459 try: 00460 # Get the selected FFL file from UI 00461 ffl_file = self.ui_elements.get("DATA FFL", "").get().strip() 00462 if not ffl_file or not os.path.exists(ffl_file): 00463 self.append_output("Error: No valid .ffl file selected.
